title: ​Object-Oriented and Additive Operator-Based Spiralization
text: spiralizePlus provides object-oriented interface extension ‘spiralize’ package. implements modular architecture spiral visualization components (axes, tracks, layers, etc.) encapsulated R S4 objects class-specific methods. Users construct complex spiral plots combining components additive operators (+) declarative syntax.

text: Object spPlot calls one following functions based value initMode:spiralize::spiral_initialize,spiralize::spiral_initialize_by_gcoor,spiralize::spiral_initialize_by_time. correct way call follows: spPlot(initMode = 'initialize',clear = TRUE,xlim = c(0,1),start = 360,end = 360 *5,scale_by = c("angle","curve_length"),period = NULL,clockwise = FALSE,flip = c("none","vertical","horizontal",""),reverse = FALSE,polar_lines = scale_by=="angle",polar_lines_by = 30,polar_lines_gp = gpar(col = "#808080"),padding = unit(5,"mm"),newpage = TRUE,vp_param = list()) spPlot(initMode = 'initialize_by_gcoor',clear = TRUE,xlim = NULL,scal_by = "curve_length",...) spPlot(initMode = 'initialize_by_time',clear = TRUE,xlim = NULL,start = NULL,end = NULL,unit_on_axis = c("days","months","weeks","hours","mins","secs"),period = c("years","months","weeks","days","hours","mins"),normalize_year = FALSE,period_per_loop = 1,polar_lines_by = NULL,verbose = TRUE,...)

title: Object generator for S4 class spPlot — spPlot
Object generator for S4 class spPlot — spPlot
text: initMode can following values:"initialize", "initialize_by_gcoor", "initialize_by_time". clear Whether call spiralize::spiral_clear drawing. ... Arguments passed spiralize::spiral_initialize, spiralize::spiral_initialize_by_gcoor, spiralize::spiral_initialize_by_time xlim Range x-locations. start Start spiral, degree. start end positive start smaller end. end End spiral, degree. scale_by scales x-axis equally interpolated? values can one "angle" "curve_length". value "angle", equal angle difference corresponds equal difference data. case, outer loops, scales longer inner loops, although difference data . value "curve_length", equal curve length difference corresponds equal difference data. period "angle" mode, number loops can also controlled argument period controls length data spiral loop corresponds . Note case, argument end ignored value end internally recalculated. clockwise Whether curve closewise direction. set TRUE, argument flip reverse ignored. flip flip spiral? default, spiral starts origin coordinate grows reverseclockwisely. argument controls growing direction spiral. reverse default, inside spiral corresponds lower boundary x-location. Setting value FALSE can reverse direction. polar_lines Whether draw polar guiding lines. polar_lines_by Increment polar lines. Measured degree. value can also vector defines add polar lines. polar_lines_gp Graphics parameters polar lines. padding Padding plotting region. value can grid::unit() length one two. newpage Whether apply grid::grid.newpage() making plot? vp_param list parameters sent grid::viewport(). unit_on_axis Units axis. normalize_year Whether enforce one spiral loop represent complete year? period_per_loop many periods put spiral loop? verbose Whether print messages?
